scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: if [ -d frontend ]; then cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install --no-workspaces --include=optional && npm rebuild rollup --no-workspaces || true && npm run build; else echo 'Error: frontend directory not found' && pwd && ls -la && exit 1; fi
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install --no-workspaces && npm run build
